title: Banned for one year. No idea why
body:
I been havn't toxic in anyways and i have actaully been supporting players such as newbie who are new to ranked. But some how i got banned FOR A YEAR. I have no idea how this is even possible. Please help.
This Account has been suspended until February 02, 2015. 
Please check the email address associated with League of Legends account for additional detail.
that's all it says. but when i check my email it doesn't tell me why i got banned

replies.body:
If you think it was a mistake then you should probably send in a ticket.

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new

Did you get banned through the Tribunal? If so, you should have gotten a report. Did you check your junk folder? Good luck.
thank you for your input. i dont think i got banned by the tribunal. I checked my spam and junk. Nothings in there i think it might have been a mistake

Hi RF Centenal!

When reading your message, I was incredibly curious as 1-year bans are not common bans.  From this, I went ahead and performed an investigation, and I can assure you that you were not "accidentally" banned, but were suspended due to recent transactions with League of Legends.  The best step at this moment is to create a new Support Ticket as linked above.  We should be able to explain the full situation to you!  ^.^
thank you, and i sent one
